total_revenue_budgeted.notes: Highest scoring candidate with 'Budgeted' data type and strong table evidence (header_match, in_table). Other candidates were rejected due to data type mismatch or an ambiguous raw KES unit. Critic confidence: 0.95, Verification confidence: 0.95 [AUTO-FIX 2025-11-02: Currency corrected from million KES to million MGA - Madagascar uses MGA not KES.]

Candidate 1 was also valid but scored slightly lower.
